# Beta diversity

```{r load_data_beta}
load("data/data.Rdata")
```

EHI02625 sample has been removed because otherwise permutest analysis was significant
```{r beta_div, comment="", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
beta_q0n <- genome_counts_filt %>%
  select(-EHI02625) %>% 
  column_to_rownames(., "genome") %>%
  filter(rowSums(. != 0, na.rm = TRUE) > 0) %>%
  select_if(~!all(. == 0)) %>%
  hillpair(., q = 0)

beta_q1n <- genome_counts_filt %>%
  select(-EHI02625) %>%
  column_to_rownames(., "genome") %>%
  filter(rowSums(. != 0, na.rm = TRUE) > 0) %>%
  select_if(~!all(. == 0)) %>%
  hillpair(., q = 1)


genome_counts_filt_beta <- genome_counts_filt %>%
  select(-EHI02625) %>%
  column_to_rownames(., "genome") %>%
  filter(rowSums(. != 0, na.rm = TRUE) > 0) %>%
  select_if(~!all(. == 0))%>%
  rownames_to_column(., "genome")

genome_tree <- keep.tip(genome_tree, tip=genome_counts_filt_beta$genome) # keep only MAG tips
beta_q1p <- genome_counts_filt %>%
  select(-EHI02625) %>%
  column_to_rownames(., "genome") %>%
  filter(rowSums(. != 0, na.rm = TRUE) > 0) %>%
  select_if(~!all(. == 0)) %>%
  hillpair(., q = 1, tree = genome_tree)

genome_gifts1 <- genome_gifts[genome_counts_filt_beta$genome,]
genome_gifts1 <- genome_gifts1[, colSums(genome_gifts1 != 0) > 0]

dist <- genome_gifts1 %>%
  to.elements(., GIFT_db) %>%
  traits2dist(., method = "gower")

beta_q1f <- genome_counts_filt %>%
  select(-EHI02625) %>%
  column_to_rownames(., "genome") %>%
  filter(rowSums(. != 0, na.rm = TRUE) > 0) %>%
  select_if(~!all(. == 0)) %>%
  hillpair(., q = 1, dist = dist)
```

## Permanova
```{r permanova, comment="", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
#Richness
sample_metadata<- sample_metadata %>% filter(sample!="EHI02625")

betadisper(beta_q0n$S, sample_metadata$environment) %>% permutest(.) 
adonis2(beta_q0n$S ~ environment+river, 
        data = sample_metadata %>% arrange(match(sample,labels(beta_q0n$S))), 
        permutations = 999) %>%
        broom::tidy() %>%
        tt()
```
```{r permanova_neutral, comment="", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
#Neutral diversity
betadisper(beta_q1n$S, sample_metadata$environment) %>% permutest(.) 
adonis2(beta_q1n$S ~ environment+river, 
        data = sample_metadata %>% arrange(match(sample,labels(beta_q1n$S))), 
        permutations = 999) %>%
        broom::tidy() %>%
        tt()
```
```{r permanova_phylo, comment="", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
#Phylogenetic diversity
betadisper(beta_q1p$S, sample_metadata$environment) %>% permutest(.) 
adonis2(beta_q1p$S ~ environment+river, 
        data = sample_metadata %>% arrange(match(sample,labels(beta_q1p$S))), 
        permutations = 999) %>%
        broom::tidy() %>%
        tt()
```

```{r permanova_func, comment="", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
#Functional diversity
betadisper(beta_q1f$S, sample_metadata$environment) %>% permutest(.) 
adonis2(beta_q1f$S ~ environment+river, 
        data = sample_metadata %>% arrange(match(sample,labels(beta_q1f$S))), 
        permutations = 999) %>%
        broom::tidy() %>%
        tt()
```

## Richness diversity plot

```{r beta_div_nmds_richness_plot, comment="", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.height=7, fig.width=10, fig.fullwidth=TRUE}
beta_q0n$S %>%
  vegan::metaMDS(., trymax = 500, k = 2, trace=0) %>%
  vegan::scores() %>%
  as_tibble(., rownames = "sample") %>%
  dplyr::left_join(sample_metadata, by = join_by(sample == sample)) %>%
  group_by(altitude, treatment) %>%
  mutate(x_cen = mean(NMDS1, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  mutate(y_cen = mean(NMDS2, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = NMDS1, y = NMDS2, color = altitude, fill = altitude, shape = as.factor(treatment))) +
  geom_point(size = 4) +
  scale_color_manual(values = altitude_colors) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = x_cen, y = y_cen, xend = NMDS1, yend = NMDS2), alpha = 0.9) +
  theme(
    axis.title = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 10),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    axis.line = element_line(size = 0.5, linetype = "solid", colour = "black"),
    legend.text = element_text(size = 10),
    legend.title = element_text(size = 12),
    legend.position = "right", legend.box = "vertical"
    ) +
    labs(shape="Temperature treatment")+geom_text_repel(aes(label = sample), size=3)

```
